## SESSION_UPDATE (2025-12-10 - Session ece72271)

RECENT_ACHIEVEMENTS update:
- PR #117: Fixed grep bugs in PROCESS-CLEANUP-PROTOCOL.md (grep -f pattern file error, grep -c self-counting) - MERGED
- PR #118: Refactored all ps|grep patterns to pgrep in cleanup protocol (9 patterns, race condition fix) - OPEN

QUALITY_GATES:
- Code-review-specialist: GO on both PRs
- All patterns verified display-only (no column parsing)

CURRENT_CI_STATUS:
- Branch: main (synced after PR #117 merge)
- New branch: fix/pgrep-process-management (PR #118)
